# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Security fixes are applied to the `main` branch only. There are no supported
long-term release branches at this time.

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report security issues privately using GitHub's "Report a vulnerability"
feature for this repository. Do not open a public issue.

If GitHub private reporting is unavailable for you, contact the maintainers
through the repository owners.

## Response Timeline

We aim to acknowledge reports within 72 hours and provide a remediation plan
or workaround within 7 days, depending on severity and complexity.
